title: Sustainability Highlights | Reliance Industries Limited
description: All businesses of Reliance Industries, along with Reliance Foundation have wholeheartedly immersed themselves in achieving ambitious targets in decarbonisation and caring for our people, our communities, and our planet. Our vision is to help transition India and the world from an Industrial Civilisation to an Ecological Civilisation.
